Class Map

java.lang.Object
Map
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
Singleton class to represent a location system that allows for items, enemies, the player, and empty spaces to be located
Author:
Destin Byrd, Nathan Taylor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void displayMap​(java.awt.Point p)
    Shows all points on the map and the location of the player
    java.awt.Point findStart()
    Retrieves the location of start coordinate on map
    char getCharAtLoc​(java.awt.Point p)
    Retrieves character from map array based on Point p param
    static Map getInstance()
    Creates an instance of Map if the object has not yet been created and returns the instance of this class
    void loadMap​(int mapNum)
    Reads in Map#.txt characters to map[][] array and unreveals all points except start
    void removeCharAtLoc​(java.awt.Point p)
    Removes anything at the coordinate given and replaces with 'n'
    void reveal​(java.awt.Point p)
    Sets the reveal status of the location given by p to true

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Map getInstance()
      Creates an instance of Map if the object has not yet been created and returns the instance of this class
      Returns:
      A Map object that is supposed to be the only one in the program

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap​(int mapNum)
      Reads in Map#.txt characters to map[][] array and unreveals all points except start
      Parameters:
      mapNum - number of map in which to read in

    • getCharAtLoc

      public char getCharAtLoc​(java.awt.Point p)
      Retrieves character from map array based on Point p param
      Parameters:
      p - point of location to retrieve char
      Returns:
      retrieved char at location

    • displayMap

      public void displayMap​(java.awt.Point p)
      Shows all points on the map and the location of the player
      Parameters:
      p - The location of the player on the map

    • findStart

      public java.awt.Point findStart()
      Retrieves the location of start coordinate on map
      Returns:
      Point of start location

    • reveal

      public void reveal​(java.awt.Point p)
      Sets the reveal status of the location given by p to true
      Parameters:
      p - The point that is being revealed

    • removeCharAtLoc

      public void removeCharAtLoc​(java.awt.Point p)
      Removes anything at the coordinate given and replaces with 'n'
      Parameters:
      p - The point that is being set to 'n'
